channel.title: NPC's not coming after player after being hit?
channel.description:
I have an NPC walking around, and after i hit him and then click one block away he doesn't come after me, how do I change this? This is very essential for my server!
Jad will ALWAYS fight even if you walk by him, so I can't copy and paste the code from him, I need it so only when you attack a monster he'll come after you and fight you.
This is making me very angry, i've been searching for two hours...
